catalog_info.title: Introduction to Laboratory Research
catalog_info.notes: M., W., F., at 4:30 James Hogle and members of the Committee Fall semester only: meets on both the Cambridge and HMS campuses. Contact department Admin for fall course schedule.
catalog_info.description: Introductory lectures by associated Biophysics faculty members. Lectures Fall semester only accompanied by three periods of instruction in laboratories of structural biology, cell and membrane biophysics, molecular genetics and development, neurobiology, bioinformatics, and physical biochemistry.
